solution_line_template: During the week she answered {calls_monday} on Mon, {calls_tuesday} on Tue, {calls_wednesday} on Wed, {calls_thursday} on Thurs and {calls_friday} on Fri for a total of {calls_monday}+{calls_tuesday}+{calls_wednesday}+{calls_thursday}+{calls_friday} = <<{calls_monday}+{calls_tuesday}+{calls_wednesday}+{calls_thursday}+{calls_friday}={total_calls}>>{total_calls} calls

She answered {total_calls} calls over {number_of_days} days so on average, she answered {total_calls}/{number_of_days} = <<{total_calls}/{number_of_days}={average_calls_per_day}>>{average_calls_per_day} calls a day
